Detailed Description

DMA configuration structure

Field Documentation

uint8_t dma_config_t::addr_mode
 

address mode: 7-6=src inc, 5-4=dst_inc, 3=IRQ, 2=M8(vlen) 1-0:priority

uint8_t dma_config_t::dst_h
 

dest. address high byte

uint8_t dma_config_t::dst_l
 

dest. address low byte

uint8_t dma_config_t::len_h
 

transfer mode in high 3 bits, length high byte, 4 lowest bits

uint8_t dma_config_t::len_l
 

length low byte

uint8_t dma_config_t::src_h
 

source address high byte

uint8_t dma_config_t::src_l
 

source address low byte

uint8_t dma_config_t::t_mode
 

transfer mode: bit7=word mode, 6-5=block/single 4-0=trigger
